div.div:
Officially Licensed
Made By Nike
The NFL® Elite jersey from Nike® is the closest thing to what your heroes are wearing on the field. Buy your favorite player jersey from the official shop of the NFL®. 1. Zoned stretch fabric at the sides is tailored for a precise fit and movement 2. Flywire strength resists stretch around the neck, so it holds its shape 3. Strategic ventilation over major heat zones helps keep you cool 4. Water-repelling fabric to help keep you stay lightweight and dry 5. Tailored fit for comfort 6. Flexible twill numbers 7. 100% Stitched player's name, number on chest, back and sleeves. Embroidered nike and team logos 8. TPU metallic-effect shield at V-neck 9. Laser-cut embossed jock tag 10. Fabric: BODY: 91% NYLON/ 9% SPANDEX MESH: 88% NYLON/ 12% SPANDEX 11. Machine wash cold 12. Made in El Salvador
